1.0.name: wordpress/resaline
1.0.description:
Resaline offers an inovative booking online reservation system for individuals ( Bed & Breakfast, cottages, holidays rentals ... )

The interactive calendar fits to any website and let the user: - be aware of your availabilities - choose any options you're proposing - edit the rental agreement - display the itinerary - book online!

The rental agreement and calendar are both multi-languages translatable to facilitate communication with foreign customer.

IMPORTANT: You need an active account in resaline.net to link your Resaline calendar to your wordpress website.
